_header: Saint Leonard the confessor aland yode here
Subjects: saints’ lives; Leonard, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Leonard in the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint leonard þe comfessour alonde ȝede herafter þat
                    god on erþe com aboute fyf hondred ȝer…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& alle þat beþ in preson I brouȝt þorw
                    synne of mankindeIhesu for seint leonardes loue þer of þou hem
                    brynge

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint leonard þe confessour a londe eode herAftur ore louerdes
                    buyrtyme a boute fif hundred ȝer…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þe miracles þat he for prisones dude ne may no man
                    telleNov god for þe bone of Seint leonard us schilde fram þe pine
                    of helle
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 456-62.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint leonard þe confessour on londe ȝeode hereAfter
                    þat Crist on eorþe com aboute fiue hondred
                    ȝere…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…þe miracles þat seint Leonard dide may no tonge
                    telleNou god shilde vs þoruh seint leonard fram þe prisoun of
                    helle
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Leonard þe confessour alonde ȝeode herAfter
                    þat god on eorþe com aboute ffyue hondred ȝer…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Þe miracles þat he ffor prisoners dude ne can no man
                    telleNow god vs schulde þorw Seint Leonard ffram þe prisoun of
                    helle

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint leonard þe confessoure was alonde hereAfter þat god
                    in erþan come aboute fyf hondred ȝere…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…þe miracles þat he for prisons dude ne may no tonge
                    tellegod vus scheld þorw his loue fram þe pyne of
                    helle
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.
         https://mss-cat.trin.cam.ac.uk/Manuscript/R.3.25.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEyn leonard þe confessor alonde ȝede hereafter þat god an erde aliȝte aboute fif hondreþ ȝere…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …þe miracle þat he prisoners dude ne mai no tong tellenou god schulde ous þorou sein leonard fro þe prison of helle
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxvi” added to left margin by later hand (f. 167v).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint leonarde þe confessour atte londene ȝeode hereAfter þat god anerþe com aboute vif hundrid ȝere…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …þe miracles þat he vor prisones dude ne mai no tonge telleNou god sschulde ous vor þe loue of seint leonard fram þe prisone of helle

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin leonard þe confessour alonde ȝeode herAfter þat god an eorþe com aboute vif hondred ȝer…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …þe miracles þat he prisons dude ne mai no tonge telleNou god ssulde us þoru sein leonard fram þe prison of helle

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Leonard þe confessour alonde ȝeode herAfter þat god an vrþe com aboute vyf hondred ȝer…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Þe miracles þat he þe prisonus dude ne mai no tunge telleNou god schulde ous for loue of Seint Leonard fram þe prisoun of helle
BLHar2277.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 2277.

D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.

                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 2.476-83.

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt leonarde þe confessour on erþe ȝede hereAfter
                    goddes birþe tyme about V C ȝere…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Þe myracles þat he of prisoneres did ne may no tongue
                    telleNow god shylde vs þurȝ saynt leonarde fro þe prisoun of
                    helle Amen
